subject: RTSC Talk Radio --- 9pm est tonight (Big Show)
author: Urkel23
full_text:
What a way to start off the new season of RTSC Talk Radio, two HUGE guests will be on.

First Guest, Bill Murphy from SyFy's original series Fact or Fake.  Also on the show, the GODFATHER of ghost boxes and the reason we are here doing this; Frank Sumption will be on.

Two guests too big to miss tonight at 9pm est. only here on RTSC talk radio.

Here's how to listen and chat:

http://www.stevehultay.com/rtsctalkradiogolive.html

Call In's are welcome at 732-587-7041

This is going to be a great show, so i hope everyone can DVR or TIVO their shows and join us.

Only on SHRN (Steve Hultay Radio Network)

-Steve H.
